dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement (thebigeasyforum.com)
dmca.body:
En


-----Original Message-----
From: piracy@templatemonster.com [mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 2004 3:03 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement (thebigeasyforum.com)

To whom it may concern
Dear Sirs,

We at Artvertex, Inc. have come to be aware that you or your customers are
hosting a website that is a copyright infringement of our website Template
Monster content at the address http://www.templatemonster.com
The website in question is http://www.tmbuccaneers.com (it forwards to
http://www.thebigeasyforum.com/thebitch/ ) and
http://www.thebigeasyforum.com . We have the evidence that this site
illegally distributes our products without being assigned ANY copyright
license.
Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright - 2002-2004
Artvertex, Inc." The presence of this material on your server is illegal.
Website content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited in any manner or
medium and is therefore making you posses illegal material.
US copyright laws protect all parts of this material. 
The owner of this website has been notified of his actions, and has been
told the consequences. If the site is not removed from your servers within
the next 10 days our Copyright attorney will file a civil lawsuit in federal
court against both you and the owner of the site.
I strongly urge you to delete the hosting account for
http://www.thebigeasyforum.com within those 10 days, before this action is
taken. This site is attempting to profit from our material and therefore the
U.S. attorneys can get involved.
If ALL of this material is removed within 10 days then no action will be
taken against you or the site owner, and neither will be convicted of a
federal crime.
This the 3rd hosting account for this website, all previous were
closed due to our notifications.
Please remove the account as soon as you receive this if possible.

-- Best regards, 

Anthony Bradshaw Legal assistant Artvertex, Inc. 
22 Jordan Road NY, Troy, 12180 
Tel: 19174770238 
Fax: 15092758568 
ICQ: 267444932 
AIM: tonbradshaw 
mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com
